Sentencas: A 2D transient mathematical model is developed for regenerative solid oxide cells operated in both SOFC mode and SOEC mode.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: The steady state performance of the model is validated using experimental results of in-house prepared NiO-YSZ/YSZ/LSM cell under different operating temperatures.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: The model is employed to investigate complicated multi-physics processes during the transient process of mode switching.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: Simulation results indicate that the trend of internal parameter distributions, including H-2/O-2/H2O and ionic potentials, flip when the operating cell is switched from one mode to another.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: However, the electronic potential shows different behaviors.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: At H-2 electrode, electronic potential keeps at zero voltage level, while at O-2 electrode, it increases from a relatively low level in SOFC mode to a relatively high level in SOEC mode.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: Transient results also show that an overshooting phenomenon occurs for mass fraction distribution of water vapor at H-2 side when the operating cell switches from SOFC mode to SOEC mode.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: The mass fractions of O-2 and H-2 as well as charge (electrons and ions) potentials may quickly follow the operating mode changes without over-shootings.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions

Sentencas: The simulation results facilitate the internal mechanism understanding for regenerative SOFCs.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions
Mathematical modeling analysis of regenerative solid oxide fuel cells in switching mode conditions
